data.eml:eml: A new species of Pheles Herrich – Schaeffer from Northeast Brazil (Lepidoptera, Riodinidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Callaghan, Curtis J., Nobre, Carlos Eduardo Beserra (2014): A new species of Pheles Herrich – Schaeffer from Northeast Brazil (Lepidoptera, Riodinidae). Zootaxa 3780 (3): 558-566, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3780.3.7
